document.title: PB1620-A Primer on Dietary Fats

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: It is not unusual to hear or read about how excess fat in your diet can lead to life-threatening diseases such as heart disease and cancer. You may already be trying to cut down on the amount of fat you eat, but are not sure how. The purpose of this publication is to help you understand the different forms of fat in your diet and help you limit the amount of fat you eat.
